CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing New Users relative to Mobile Users?
SRP.A: New Users is {below} Mobile Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Mobile Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {New Users}.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's Average Watch Time in 2011?
VE.A: Mobile Users's average watch time in 2011 is {53.38} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Desktop Users's Average Watch Time in 2006?
VE.A: Desktop Users's average watch time in 2006 is {37.16} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Desktop Users's Average Watch Time in 2012?
VE.A: Desktop Users's average watch time in 2012 is {33.71} minutes.

VE.Q: What are the average watch time of Free Users, Desktop Users, and New Users in 2007?
VE.A: Free Users's average watch time is {28.68} minutes, Desktop Users's average watch time is {32.66} minutes, New Users's average watch time is {28.03} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Watch Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average watch time is {7.82} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Watch Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average watch time is {104.34} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Watch Time level recorded for Desktop Users?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users reached approximately {37.54} minutes in {2016}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Watch Time level recorded for Desktop Users?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {21.67} minutes in {2009}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Average Watch Time?
SC.A: The average total average watch time is {133.01} minutes.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Watch Time exceed 135.47 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Watch Time fall between 124.21 and 137.29 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Watch Time go below 126.03 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2018, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 2010 and 2012?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 2013 and 2018 was {higher} than between 2010 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2018, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 2009 and 2016?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 2010 and 2018 was {higher} than between 2009 and 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2015, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 2014 and 2017?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 2007 and 2015 was {lower} than between 2014 and 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2014, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 2006 and 2011?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 2006 and 2014 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2011.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Mobile Users} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {New Users, Free Users, Desktop Users, Mobile Users}.
